overview: Jay Sin is back and pushing the limits of the female sphincter further than ever with Pretty Sloppy #2! The emphasis is on lascivious libations, as Tara Lynn Rox loves the taste of milk fresh from Adrianna Nicole’s freshly tapped ass; Bobbi Starr shows first-time anal lesbian Tori Black how to serve up a really dirty martini; and Kristina Rose serves up a mouthful of freshly squeezed spit and cock for nasty-girl legend Ashley Blue. Also, Phoenix Marie gets sent to Pretty Sloppy Prison and learns the true meaning of “lockdown,” and Harmony Rose and Amber Rayne share a dildo of literally horsecock-sized proportions!
title: Pretty Sloppy 2
